item.title: Configuring DNS search path for Enterprise PKS Kubernetes Clusters
item.description: Often, applications running in Kubernetes requires access to external services to function properly, it could be databases, Identity services (SSO), backend applications running on Virtual Machines, etc. When accessing external corporate services or internet services – using DNS names, with current Enterprise PKS configuration, BOSH does not configure search path to allow using short names. for instance, application in Kubernetes would like to access “mssql” service, assuming that corporate DNS is authoritative for “corp.
